songs.title: Behind Da Scenes
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Behind the scenes, yeah (Behind the scenes)
Coppin' pleas (Coppin' pleas)
Bitch, please, yeah (Bitch, please)
Nigga, please, yeah (Nigga, please)
I'm the biggest squid, yeah (Biggest squid)
Your crew a bitch, yeah (Ya dig?)
Rob 'em out (Rob 'em out)
Slap 'em out (Slap 'em out)
Slidin' with the fire, yeah (Slidin' with the fire)
Take a nigga strap, yeah (Yeah)
Squig 'em out, yeah (Yeah)
Triple 6 giving these niggas hell (Hell)
We ain't callin' twelve (Twelve)
We ain't never gon' tell (Tell)
Pop that nigga like yeah, yeah, yeah (Yeah)

[Verse 1]
These nigga pussy (These nigga pussy)
My gun is a freak (Oh yeah)
We ain't steppin' on meat (What that mean?)
We ain't squashin' no beef (Beef)
Clean up the scene, swept it so neat (Yeah)
Leave him Krispy like a treat (Ooh)
Backspace a nigga, hit delete (Delete)
Ooh, them guns be elite
Cooler on that TEC just in case this bitch overheat (Brr)
Too many characters swear these boys is some tweets (Tweets)
Grill a nigga for that cheese (Cheese)
Spot his shirt like some bleach (Bleach)
I want your ass to leave then bitch, you gotta leave, yeah

[Chorus]
Behind the scenes, yeah
Coppin' pleas (Coppin' pleas)
Bitch, please, yeah (Bitch, please)
Nigga, please, yeah (Nigga, please)
I'm the biggest squid, yeah (Biggest squid)
Your crew a bitch, yeah (Ya dig?)
Rob 'em out (Rob 'em out)
Slap 'em out (Slap 'em out)
Slidin' with the fire, yeah (Slidin' with the fire)
Take a nigga strap, yeah (Yeah)
Squig 'em out, yeah (Yeah)
Triple 6 giving these niggas hell (Hell)
We ain't callin' twelve (Twelve)
We ain't never gon' tell (Tell)
Pop that nigga like yeah, yeah, yeah (Yeah)

[Verse 2]
I don't hide and seek (Seek)
I just glide and skeet (Skeet)
Palm her ass like Keke
If the ho on fleek (Fleek)
These ho obsolete
On the Gram tryna flex on me (Me)
Talking 'bout I ate that P (P)
Bitch, I ain't eat that P (No sir)
But you took this D
I swear these bitches lyin', need to take they teeth (Yeah)
Behind the scenes all these hoes dead beat
Fuckin' in the bed with they child sheets, ooh-wee
I must be geeked, caught 'em in the streets
He a athlete, track meet
Every time they see me, on sight
Every time they meet me, behind the scenes

[Chorus]
Behind the scenes, yeah
Coppin' pleas (Coppin' pleas)
Bitch, please, yeah (Bitch, please)
Nigga, please, yeah (Nigga, please)
I'm the biggest squid, yeah (Biggest squid)
Your crew a bitch, yeah (Ya dig?)
Rob 'em out (Rob 'em out)
Slap 'em out (Slap 'em out)
Slidin' with the fire, yeah (Slidin' with the fire)
Take a nigga strap, yeah (Yeah)
Squig 'em out, yeah (Yeah)
Triple 6 giving these niggas hell (Hell)
We ain't callin' twelve (Twelve)
We ain't never gon' tell (Tell)
Pop that nigga like yeah, yeah, yeah (Yeah)
Behind the scenes, yeah (Behind the scenes)
Coppin' pleas (Coppin' pleas)
Bitch, please, yeah (Bitch, please)
Nigga, please, yeah (Nigga, please)
I'm the biggest squid, yeah (Biggest squid)
Your crew a bitch, yeah (Ya dig?)
Rob 'em out (Rob 'em out)
Slap 'em out (Slap 'em out)
Slidin' with the fire, yeah (Slidin' with the fire)
Take a nigga strap, yeah (Yeah)
Squig 'em out, yeah (Yeah)
Triple 6 giving these niggas hell (Hell)

[Outro]
Behind the scenes, yeah
Coppin' pleas, yeah
